snippet.title: Renfield: Bring Your Own Blood - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Renfield: Bring Your Own Blood is a single-player bug-powered adventure that combines the simplicity of one-touch gameplay with frenetic, room-based action for a new roguelite experience. With unique stages, dozens of enemies, diabolical bosses and enough weapons for a bloody good rampage, Renfield: Bring Your Own Blood shows you the ups and downs of being the #1 employee of the most demanding boss in history - Dracula.

Get it now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2354600

Inspired by the events of the movie from Universal Pictures, Renfield: Bring Your Own Blood is available in Early Access on Steam/Windows. More story, weapons, levels and bosses will be coming for free as the game slashes its way to final launch this year.
